name: Dont Abandon The Platform
description: My first game made in unity, I hope you enjoy, the ideia of the game it´s to not abandon the platform while  it runs away to the right. But sometimes you will have to choose the best path to reach the platform, defeat the enemies, avoid the attacks and collect the coins and power-ups. Every enemie have his weeakness and they attack with many different ways (jumping, range attack ,run attack). The protagonist shoot's onion projectils, and he will try to discover who caught all onions in earth and destroyed all the environment. A new game mode  will appear in the next game update. Give your feedback if you want in the comments.
